title: "LeagueClient.exe - Bad Image"
body:
https://i.gyazo.com/6aaa5d192d7f0e78a9fb720c92d2d7ea.png

I've had this five time and I've had to redownload league every time to fix it, when I use the Hextech Repair tool it says that there's nothing wrong??? 

It's getting very annoying

replies.body: Your antivirus or firewall software is likely blocking League's .dll files, but it can be fixed!  You'll need to configure it by granting  the entire League of Legends folder access.  Once complete, I recommend a[ manual reinstall](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) without the HRT, and making sure to run it as Administrator.  Let me know if that helps!
Thank you, It worked. I guess what happened is that I had a free trial of a Antivirus program and it was blocking it but I didn't see it at first on my taskbar or desktop.
